text.p: These are some of the leading stories in the Bahraini press on Monday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Gulf Cooperation Council foreign ministers will meet in Riyadh on January six to discuss Bahrain-Qatar border dispute, Bahraini minister says.
- Foreign workers in Saudi Arabia transferred over $154.6 billion out of the kingdom in the past 17 years, bank figures show.
- Kuwait welcomes Bahrain's decision to pardon two Qataris jailed after they were found guilty of spying for Qatar.
